titles.title: African Development Foundation Act of 2007
A bill to amend the African Development Foundation Act to change the name of the Foundation, modify the administrative authorities of the Foundation, and for other purposes.
African Development Foundation Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
African Development Foundation Act of 2007 - Amends the African Development Foundation Act to rename the African Development Foundation as the United States African Development Foundation.
Increases individual project funding limits.
Authorizes the Foundation to make awards to qualifying small- or medium-sized entities that are not wholly owned or controlled African entities.
Authorizes (current law requires) the Foundation's Board of Directors to establish an advisory council.
